root.ad_description_full: Type: Cabin Cruisers Manufacturer: Marine Projects Ltd Model:330 Fly Bridge Model:330 Fly Bridge Mooring Country: France Year built: 1991 Flag: French Length: 10.00 m/33 ft Width: 3.47 m/11 ft Draft: 0.850 m/3 ft Propulsion: Shaft-drive No. of engines: 2 Engine hours: 977 Fuel: Diesel About Princess 330 Flybridge cruiser. Built 1991. Twin Volvo TAMD 41 200hp diesel motors. 977hrs. Present owner upgraded and replaced hoses cables fixings fuel filter system. Regular servicing. Relaunched June 2016. anodes antifouled ready to go. This is a clean and tidy example of the popular classic 33' cruiser with flybridge, bathing platform, davits and Avon semi-rigid. Radar, chart plotter, VHF, bow thruster, Eberspacher heating, and shore power. Two double cabins with storage standing headroom lighting and cushions in like new condition. Galley with 2 s/s bowl, gas oven hob and hot water. Saloon area convertible to form further a double berth. 6 berth accommodation. Vessel well equipped. The vessel has been lightly used for trips between France and Channel Islands. Priced to sell as owners plans changed. Lying in Perros Guirec, Brittany. French taxes paid. All details to be confirmed and verified with owner.
